buffs.description: The maximum value of Spirit Rest increases by 2.5%, increasing maximum efficiency up to 12.5% (The maximum efficiency of current Spirit Rest increases from 10% to 12.5%. In addition, when Dark Spirit is awakened, the maximum efficiency increases from 12.5 to 15%).
buffs.name: Limit Break of Spirit Rest

hidden_abilites: Increases the basic speed of the game by 4%, and increases the attack range and movement speed by 7%.
When first appearing, increases attack speed and movement speed of ally units for a certain period of time.
Increases movement speed, attack power, and critical hit damage of all units by 4%.
Unlimited dash can be done, and is less affected by knock back, freeze, and blow attack.

The maximum value of Spirit Rest increases more by 2.5%, increasing maximum efficiency up to 12.5%. (The maximum efficiency of current Spirit Rest increases 10% -> 12.5%.) In addition, when Dark Spirit is awakened, the maximum efficiency increases to 15%.)
description.skill2: Increase attack speed of orc unit in Guild Raid (0%, 0%, 4%, 7%, 14%)
description.skill3: Awakens the hidden special ability of [ Senior Blade Master ]
